original: Ekström, Arthur Ludvig, advokat, Vänersborg, f. 9/7/08 i Gbg av gross-handl. Carl E. o. Signe Gislow. G. 36 m. Naema von Sydow. Barn: Håkan f. 39, Johan 43. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs h. ilatin 28, fil. kand. i Gbg 31, jur. kand. i Upps. 34. Tingstjg. i Lindes doms. 34-37," bitr. jurist h. adv. G. Fogelqvist i Sundsvall 37-38, egen adv iverksamh. i Tranås 38-44, förest, f. rättshjälpsanst. i Vänersborg sed. 44. Led. av Sv:es adv:samf. sed. 39. Led. av istadsfullm. i Gbg.
translated: Ekström, Arthur Ludvig, lawyer, Vänersborg, b. 9/7/08 in Gothenburg, son of merchant Carl E. and Signe Gislow. Married in 1936 to Naema von Sydow. Children: Håkan b. 1939, Johan b. 1943. Education: Stude-exam from Gothenburg high school with a focus on Latin in 1928, Bachelor of Arts degree in Gothenburg in 1931, law degree from Uppsala University in 1934. Served as a clerk at Lindes district court from 1934-1937, assistant lawyer at G. Fogelqvist law firm in Sundsvall from 1937-1938, had his own legal practice in Tranås from 1938-1944, and was the head of a legal aid institute in Vänersborg from 1944. Member of the Swedish Bar Association since 1939 and member of the Gothenburg delegation since (no date given).

memberOf.name: His own legal practice in Tranås
